name: Firerescue
description:
Get your fire department ready to fight forest fires and protect housing. 
Use your handcrew,  fire engine, fire tanker or helicopter.

This demo consists of 4 levels. Play till 14:00 on the  clock in the game and end your shift to get the next level or play as long as you want.

This small game is in development (ALPHA) and will get more content and features in the next weeks. Possible ideas:

  • adding emergency system
  • more levels with various goals
  • Achievements  and medals
  • Shop system to expand your fire departement based on your highscore
  • meta system with world map

Please give us feedback (what you like, what not and whats missing) on our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/AfCAbzEt
